name: 2020 International Symposium on Fundamental and Applied Sciences (8th ISFAS)
content: Artificial Intelligence is based on the research of fundamental and applied sciences. Through the evolution of information and engineering, it has gradually penetrated and changed not only our lives but our work style, which has resulted in bringing new experiences and convenience. And yet we’re facing with an unprecedented challenge and a crisis of privacy. An agenda, such diversified and interdisciplinary, the 8th ISFAS sincerely invite all relevant professionals in both academic and the industry to present and to exchange. All relevant abstracts/full papers in regards to “Fundamental and Applied Sciences" are welcomed as well as the fields of AI, 5G, IoT and Blockchain. For more information, please visit http://www.isfas.org/ or contact isfas@isfas.org
